## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media
features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use
of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may
combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve
collected from your use of their services.

Do not sell or share my personal information

## Frequently asked questions

What can't I create with Copy.ai?

Copy.ai doesn't natively generate images or video. However, you can build any
text-based message or campaign with Chat. And you can scale any text-based
campaign with Workflows.  

What are Workflows?

Workflows by Copy.ai is a brand new AI-powered automation platform that
empowers teams to automate processes and campaigns at scale. Simply type the
processes you want to automate, verify the results, and run it at scale.

What are Workflow credits?

A credit refers to a unit that represents a specific amount of generated
content or access to certain features within the platform for example,
internet searches, scanning websites, and more.

What is a credit worth?

A credit's value depends on the complexity of the tasks performed within
Copy.ai, such as generating text, or using the API. Each workflow run might
have different credit consumption, depending on the steps and content it
generates.

How much does a workflow run cost?

How much a workflow run costs depends on the complexity of the workflow. The
more steps and content a workflow generates, the more it'll cost in credits.
You can see how much a run costs by opening the side panel and looking at the
"Credits used" for the run.

Can I change my plan later?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. If you choose to upgrade,
you'll pay a prorated amount for the rest of the month. If you choose to
downgrade, you'll be credited on next month's bill.

Which plans allow for unlimited words?

Unlimited words are available on Pro, Team, Growth, Scale and Enterprise
plans.

Do you have a sales team?

Yes, you can contact our sales team to book a demo for our Enterprise plans.
